Invocation Name: clivet
des:
With the Clivet skill you can interact with your Smart Living system and all the associated devices.

In order to use this skill, you need a Clivet Eye account.
Additionally, you must enable the skill by logging in with your account, following these steps:
• From the skill menu, click on "ENABLE TO USE"
• Link your Clivet Eye account
• Add devices using the command "Alexa, discover devices"

With this skill, you can:
• Set the desired temperature on each thermostat
• Know the temperature of every room equipped with a thermostat
• Increase or decrease the temperature
• Set the thermostat to Off
• Create and control groups of thermostats

You can also:
• Ask how the system is performing
• Ask how's the air quality
• Ask how long the system has been running today
• Ask for tomorrow's forecast
• Ask about the air renewal status
• Ask about the nocturnal recharge status
• Activate and deactivate nocturnal recharge
• Activate and deactivate air renewal

Supported devices:
• Control4 NRG
